segments.text: I'm going to work in a multi-national enterprise after graduation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: but you said your dream was to be an entrepreneur , to be your own boss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll do it someday . But it's not the right time now . I have to learn a lot by working as an employee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it sounds like you've got a perfect plan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you could say so . I'll work hard in that company and try to understand as much as possible about how to run an enterprise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it can save you lots of time and effort to simply copy a successful business model .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yeah , the success stories of that company might be useful for me . And their customers may become the potential ones for my own company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's right . You should establish good relationships with them . what else are you planning to do while working for that company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , I'll come up with a detailed business plan to attract the investors .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sounds perfect . I think with all that you have in mind , you'll become a successful businessman . By then , perhaps , I'll join in as a partner of your company .
segments.speaker: S2
